name: Hooktic
description:
• Game

Hooktic is a simple boss fighting game which uses a grappling hook. Made for GMC Jam 8.

Controls:

AD/LR Arrows - Move
W/Up arrow - Jump
Left Mouse Button - Shoot
Right Mouse Button - Use Grappling Hook

• Development

The menu was coded before the jam period.

• Credits

Programming, concept and art by matharoo

All audio was created in FL Studio 12 by Micah_DS during the jam, mostly within the last 24 hours.

Random trivia: All the sounds were created using just a single 3x Osc instrument + blue/azure noise.
